message.body: Im here, i tried to call you last night from the house cuz there was no cell service, they just hooked up an antenna
Its nice, theres a pond full of rainbow trout!

Gabi-Tiki is being so hard to communicate with about the fridge. He told me the repair man was coming today on Sunday. Now he said they aren't coming until tomorrow. I said my food is ruined now, and he basically said too bad, he can't control the guy's schedule.
We can make a renters insurance claim, but unfortunately i dont think hes required to do anything
I think i have a $250 deductible, so we can make the food in there add up we should file it
I'm just frustrated that he didn't have the courtesy to let me know about the repair. It is unprofessional for a property manager.
A Midsummer Night's Dream was incredible yesterday. Puck especially; he was so acrobatic. Very magical.
Lots of the same actors from A Winter's Tale.
Nice! I like that theatre too
